--   type:      Oracle Database 11g



CREATE TABLE akce (
    aid         INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nazev       VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    datumk      DATE NOT NULL,
    cena        INTEGER,
    vedoucia    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    hodnostia   INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE akce ADD CONSTRAINT akce_pk PRIMARY KEY ( aid );

CREATE TABLE "Akce-archiv" (
    aid       INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nazev     VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    datumk    DATE NOT NULL,
    cena      INTEGER,
    archiva   INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE "Akce-archiv" ADD CONSTRAINT "Akce-archiv_PK" PRIMARY KEY ( aid );

CREATE TABLE deti (
    did         INTEGER NOT NULL,
    jmeno       VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    nickname    VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    pw          VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    datumn      DATE NOT NULL,
    kontaktnr   VARCHAR2(13) NOT NULL,
    hodnostd    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    schuzkad    INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE deti ADD CONSTRAINT dìti_pk PRIMARY KEY ( did );

CREATE TABLE detiarchiv (
    did         INTEGER NOT NULL,
    jmeno       VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    datumn      DATE NOT NULL,
    kontaktnr   VARCHAR2(13) NOT NULL,
    archivd     INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE detiarchiv ADD CONSTRAINT "Dìti-archiv_PK" PRIMARY KEY ( did );

CREATE TABLE hodnosti (
    hid      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nazev    VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    minvek   INTEGER
);

ALTER TABLE hodnosti ADD CONSTRAINT hodnosti_pk PRIMARY KEY ( hid );

CREATE TABLE schuzky (
    sid        INTEGER NOT NULL,
    nazev      VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    pocetd     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    datumk     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    vedoucis   INTEGER NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE schuzky ADD CONSTRAINT schùzky_pk PRIMARY KEY ( sid );

CREATE TABLE vedouci (
    vid       INTEGER NOT NULL,
    jmeno     VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    pw        VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    datumn    DATE NOT NULL,
    kontakt   VARCHAR2(13) NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE vedouci ADD CONSTRAINT vedoucí_pk PRIMARY KEY ( vid );

ALTER TABLE akce
    ADD CONSTRAINT akce_hodnosti_fk FOREIGN KEY ( hodnostia )
        REFERENCES hodnosti ( hid );

ALTER TABLE akce
    ADD CONSTRAINT akce_vedoucí_fk FOREIGN KEY ( vedoucia )
        REFERENCES vedouci ( vid );

ALTER TABLE "Akce-archiv"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Akce-archiv_Akce_FK" FOREIGN KEY ( archiva )
        REFERENCES akce ( aid );

ALTER TABLE deti
    ADD CONSTRAINT dìti_hodnosti_fk FOREIGN KEY ( hodnostd )
        REFERENCES hodnosti ( hid );

ALTER TABLE deti
    ADD CONSTRAINT dìti_schùzky_fk FOREIGN KEY ( schuzkad )
        REFERENCES schuzky ( sid );

ALTER TABLE detiarchiv
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Dìti-archiv_Dìti_FK" FOREIGN KEY ( archivd )
        REFERENCES deti ( did );

ALTER TABLE schuzky
    ADD CONSTRAINT schùzky_vedoucí_fk FOREIGN KEY ( vedoucis )
        REFERENCES vedouci ( vid );

ALTER TABLE akce
    ADD CONSTRAINT akce_hodnosti_fk FOREIGN KEY ( hodnostia )
        REFERENCES hodnosti ( hid );

ALTER TABLE akce
    ADD CONSTRAINT akce_vedoucí_fk FOREIGN KEY ( vedoucia )
        REFERENCES vedouci ( vid );

ALTER TABLE "Akce-archiv"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Akce-archiv_Akce_FK" FOREIGN KEY ( archiva )
        REFERENCES akce ( aid );

ALTER TABLE deti
    ADD CONSTRAINT dìti_hodnosti_fk FOREIGN KEY ( hodnostd )
        REFERENCES hodnosti ( hid );

ALTER TABLE deti
    ADD CONSTRAINT dìti_schùzky_fk FOREIGN KEY ( schuzkad )
        REFERENCES schuzky ( sid );

ALTER TABLE detiarchiv
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Dìti-archiv_Dìti_FK" FOREIGN KEY ( archivd )
        REFERENCES deti ( did );

ALTER TABLE schuzky
    ADD CONSTRAINT schùzky_vedoucí_fk FOREIGN KEY ( vedoucis )
        REFERENCES vedouci ( vid );
